name: Paper.
description:
Paper is a game that was originally about fighting your newsprint overlords, and was slowly pared down more, and more, and more, until now, it is... at the very essence of fighting your newsprint overlords. Really, it is.

Click to start. Left/right to move.

I... may have had several crashes during the process of making this. That totally in no way effected the game and its length and concept. Nope. Not at all.

Created for Ludum Dare 32: An Unconventional Weapon. LD page here.
